Method.name: pkgmatch
export
import
patch
fixXMLLine
Method.Implementation:
set stream = ##class(%Stream.FileBinary).%New() do stream.LinkToFile(filename) do $system.OBJ.ExportToStream(documentName, .stream)
set matcher=##class(%Regex.Matcher).%New("<Export generator=.+>") set matcher.Text = stream.Read(stream.Size) set data = matcher.ReplaceFirst("<Export generator=""Cache"">")
do stream.Clear() do stream.Write(data) return stream.%Save()

Method.name: inFilter
Method.Implementation:
s result=0 for { if '$d(filtermask($I(i))) quit set filter=$piece(filtermask(i),"*") if $length(filename,filter)>1 set result=1 }
quit result

Method.name: setIgnore
Method.Description: get the filtermask for the repository. looks for .gitignore file and applies all the lines to filters

Method.name: srcdir
Method.Implementation: s gln = ..gln("srcdir") s:$d(srcdir) @gln = "src" ///src - directory by default Q $g(@gln, "src")

Method.name: projectdir
Method.Implementation: s gln = ..gln("projectdir") s:$d(projectdir) @gln = projectdir ///zu(12) namespace directory by default #define nsdir $zu(12,"") Q $g(@gln, $$$nsdir)

Method.name: workdir
Method.Description: get or set working directory for export/import source
Method.Implementation: s src = ..srcdir() s prj = ..projectdir() s:'($e(prj,*)="/") prj = prj_"/" Q ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename(prj_src)

Method.name: gln
Method.Implementation: "^"_$classname()_"("""_param_""")"

Method.name: init
Method.Implementation:
set stream=##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() set sc=stream.LinkToFile(..workdir()_"/"_confile) s conf={}.%FromJSON(stream.Read($$$MaxCacheInt))
s gln=..gln()
s @gln@("compileList")=conf.compileList s @gln@("projectName")=conf.projectName s @gln@("owner")=conf.owner s @gln@("repository")=conf.repository s @gln@("user")=conf.user s @gln@("password")=conf.password s @gln@("git")=conf.git
w "compileList="_conf.compileList,! w "projectName="_conf.projectName,! w "owner="_conf.owner,! w "repository="_conf.repository,! w "user="_conf.user,! w "password="_conf.password,! w "git="_conf.git,!
quit $$$OK

Method.name: release
Method.Description: export release file for list and project settings
Method.Implementation:
s gln=..gln() s list=$G(@gln@("compileList")) if list="" w "Nothing to release. Run init method first" quit
s release=$G(@gln@("projectName"),"release") s release=release_$p($zdt($h,8)," ")_$tr($p($p($zdt($h)," ",2),":",1,2),":")_".xml" D $System.OBJ.Export(list,release) w "All objects with mask "_list_" has been exported to "_release

Method.name: compile
Method.Implementation: s gln=..gln() s list=$G(@gln@("compileList")) if list="" w "Nothing to compile. Run init method first" quit d $System.OBJ.compile(list)

Method.name: filename
importUpdated
Method.Description: import from workdir all files with ts newer than code ts in db

Method.name: codename
codets
fixDashIntoName

Parameter.name: SRCDIRNAME
Parameter.Description: Name of the subdir that will hold Cach√© files in Git workdir

Property.name: GitPath
Property.Description: Path to GIT binaries (with trailing slash)

Property.name: WorkDir
Property.Description: Path to GIT work dir (with trailing slash)

Property.name: HomeDir
Property.Description: HOME path (Unix only). The value will be set as $HOME before executing git commands.

Property.name: AuthorName
Property.Description: Git Author name (used in commits). If set, it will be used in the GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL env. variable

Property.name: AuthorEmail
Property.Description: Git Author email (used in commits). If set, it will be used in the GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL env. variable

Property.name: CacheDir
Property.Description: Path to Cache files in GIT work dir (with trailing slash)

Property.name: ErrorFile
Property.Description: Temporary file to store errors from commands

Property.name: OutputFile
Property.Description: Temporary file to store output from commands

Property.name: GitRepository
Property.Description: Path to the Git Repository for this User/Namespace

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
if ((pWorkDir="")||(pOutput="")||(pError="")) { $$$ThrowStatus($$$ERROR($$$GeneralError,"WorkDir, OutputFile or ErrorFile is set to null")) } set ..GitRepository=pGitRepo set ..GitPath = pGitPath set ..WorkDir = pWorkDir set ..HomeDir = pHomeDir set ..AuthorName = pAuthorName set ..AuthorEmail = pAuthorEmail set ..CacheDir = pWorkDir_..#SRCDIRNAME set ..OutputFile = pOutput set ..ErrorFile = pError set ..Logger = ##class(CTRL.Logger).%New()
quit $$$OK

Method.name: Clone
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git clone "_..GitRepository, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Add
Commit
Method.Implementation: set opts="-a" set:pAmend opts=opts_" --amend" quit ..RunCmd("git commit "_opts_" -m """_pMsg_"""", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Status
Checkout
Log
Method.Implementation:
set file = "" if pFile'="" set file = ""_pFile_""
quit ..RunCmd("git log --pretty=format:""%h %ad | %s%d [%an]"" --graph --date=short --max-count=20 "_file, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Reset
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git reset HEAD """_pFile_"""", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Branch
ListConfig
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git config --list", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: GetCurrentBranch
Method.Description: Returns a string with the name of the current branch
Method.Implementation: set result="" set tSC=..CurrentBranch(.output,0) if $$$ISOK(tSC) set result=output(1) quit result

Method.name: CurrentBranch
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: DiffStatus
Method.Description: git diff --name-status: useful to know what changes (status) have been done to files
Method.Implementation: set current = ..GetCurrentBranch() set opts="--name-status" set:pReverse opts=opts_" -R" quit ..RunCmd("git diff "_opts_" "_pBranch, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: DiffStat
Method.Description: git diff --stat: useful to report statistics about changes
Method.Implementation: set current = ..GetCurrentBranch() set opts="--stat" set:pReverse opts=opts_" -R" quit ..RunCmd("git diff "_opts_" "_pBranch, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Diff
Method.Description: git diff: simple changes made in a file
Method.Implementation: set opts="--patience" quit ..RunCmd("git diff "_opts_" "_pFile, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Push
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git push "_..GitRepository_" --all", .pOutput, pLog, 1)

Method.name: Pull
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git pull", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: RemoteUpdate
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git remote update "_pGroup, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: Merge
Method.Implementation: set opts="--no-commit --no-ff" set:pAbort opts="--abort" quit ..RunCmd("git merge "_opts_" "_pBranch, .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: LsFiles
Method.Implementation: quit ..RunCmd("git ls-files --cached -v", .pOutput, pLog)

Method.name: RunCmd
Method.Description: Runs a cmd in the OS and returns the output and error

Method.name: testme
Method.Implementation:
Set gitpath="C:\GIT\bin\" Set wrkdir="C:\DEV\SrcCtrl" Set homedir="" Set pAuthName="PeteOH" Set pAuthEmail="peteohalloran@gmail.com" Set pout=wrkdir_"\git.out" Set perr=wrkdir_"\git.err" Set gitrepo="https://PeteOH:Bluesky!GH1@github.com/peteoh/srcctrl.git"
#dim git As CTRL.GITClient
Set git=##class(CTRL.GITClient).%New(gitpath,wrkdir,homedir,pAuthName,pAuthEmail,pout,perr,gitrepo)
set sout = ""
Do git.Add("",.sout,1)
w sout
Do git.Commit("","testing",.sout)
w sout
Do git.Push(.sout)
w sout

Parameter.name: iscProductVersion
Parameter.Description: In older Cache versions, method "GetISCProduct" does not exist

Method.name: CreateProjection
Method.Description: This method is invoked when a class is compiled.

Method.name: RemoveProjection
Method.Description: This method is invoked when a class is 'uncompiled'.
Method.Implementation:
set st = $$$OK
new $Namespace
write:(recompile) !, "Recompiling CTRL, skipping the deletion..." return:(recompile) $$$OK
set ns = $get(^WebTerminal("HomeNamespace"), $Namespace) write !, "Uninstalling CTRL application from ", ns zn "%SYS"
write !, "Unmapping CTRL package from all namespaces:" set st = ..UnMap(ns) if ($$$ISERR(st)) { write !, "Unmapping failed." } else { write !, "Unmapping complete." }
return st

Method.name: CreateAllNamespace
Map
UnMap
Log
Debug
Method.Implementation: do ..Log(..#DEBUG, pMsg, pNL)

Method.name: Error
Method.Implementation: do ..Log(..#ERROR, pMsg, pNL)

Method.name: Info
Method.Implementation: do ..Log(..#INFO, pMsg, pNL)
